A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very different from all previous Star War films.....and that's a good thing. Takes the compelling new characters introduced in the previous chapter and puts them through things we haven't seen before in the franchise. Great pacing\, plot\, and script\, with a few laughs thrown in to make it all feel less heavy. Awesome acting from old-comers and new comers alike\, and wonderful send off for Ms. Fisher.
